page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: My name is Robert William Ellison. I live with my family and dog called Fluffy. I am 14 years old.In the morning my Mum gets me up. I have a wash, a cup of tea and watch T.V. Then I walk to catch the school bus. I go to my class and talk to my friends before school. I have four lessons in the morning. At break I go to the tuck shop and buy a drink and crisps. At lunchtime I go to the chippy and the rec. There are four lessons after lunch and then I rush to catch the bus. My favourite lesson in school is P.E. and I'm in the basketball team. When I get home I get changed and go to the Welfare Club to play pool. I have a few drinks with my Dad and his mates. He gets there around 8.00 as he works the late shift at Dawmill Colliery. I go to bed at midnight and fall fast asleep.
